mapper.select: SELECT dr.dr_idx, dr.d_idx, dr.d_commute, dr.d_date, dr.d_startTime, dr.d_endTime, dr.d_startPoint, dr.d_endPoint, dr.d_startlon, dr.d_startlat, dr.d_endlon, dr.d_endlat, dr.d_fee, r.p_idx, r.r_idx, r.r_date FROM d_registration dr, reservation r WHERE dr.dr_idx=r.dr_idx AND r.p_idx=#{pIdx} AND r.r_acceptStatus = 'accepted' AND dr.d_date >= sysdate
